RelatedSentence: The Washington Post reported last week on the latest round of competing advertising on the sides of Washington , DC 's Metro buses .

In mid-March to mid-April , the Illinois - based group American Muslims for Palestine bought advertising space on the sides of 20 buses for an a banner ad featuring a drawing of Uncle Sam waving an Israeli flag , and reading : We 're Sweating April 15 So Israelis Do n't Have To !
